product_name: Columbia Poleta Peak Plush Jacket - Women's
long_description: Super comfy for snuggling into on frosty mornings, the women's Columbia Poleta Peak Plush Jacket is lined with plush polyester fleece. Ripstop polyester shell fabric resists light wind and moisture. Omni-Shield(TM) finish resists rain and stains. Hood and droptail hem extend your coverage on both ends. Hem drawcord lets you cinch in warmth. Zippered hand pockets; diagonal hidden-zip chest pocket. Columbia Poleta Peak Plush Jacket for women features an active fit for your outdoor pursuits.
short_description: Super comfy for snuggling into on frosty mornings, the women's Columbia Poleta Peak Plush Jacket is lined with plush polyester fleece. Ripstop polyester shell fabric resists light wind and moisture.
